Let's Talk

Vars

Numbers

Mathematics? Software? Both!

Hi there!

I am a self-employed software developer with a master's degree in mathematics. Sounds like two different subjects? They are, and that's awesome! I try to bring the two worlds together and make them complement each other. I use to call this "my work". After all, that's what vars and numbers are here for, right?
